pr_title: docs: fix broken links in ksqldb-clients content (DOCS-4756)

timeline.message: docs: fix broken links in ksqldb-clients content (DOCS-4756)

timeline.bodyText:
Hey @JimGalasyn , thanks for catching these broken links! I meant to link to the subsections on this page, rather than the API docs. WDYT? #5712
The broken links were leftover from before a refactor (previously each subsection of this doc was its own page) -- my bad!
timeline.author: vcrfxia
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -134,7 +134,8 @@ public interface Client {
 ```
 
 You can use this method to issue both push and pull queries, but the usage pattern is better for push queries.
-For pull queries, consider [the `executeQuery()` method](./execute-query.md) instead. 
+For pull queries, consider using the [`executeQuery()`](api/io/confluent/ksql/api/client/Client.html#executeQuery(java.lang.String))
